summary: Remove the /api/v1/ prefix from HTTP API paths to simplify the API surface. This is an incompatible change but is acceptable since the HTTP API has not been fully released.
userImpact: Users will need to update their HTTP API calls to use paths without the /api/v1/ prefix.
proposedFix: Remove /api/v1/ prefix from all HTTP API paths
resolutionDetails: The feature was implemented and the HTTP API paths were updated to remove the /api/v1/ prefix.
keyQuote: we have decided to remove this unnecessary prefix from API paths
